power.title: Blunder
power.fluff: You fog your foe's mind, causing it to stumble past your allies

section.name: Target:
section.text: One creature

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Charisma vs. Will

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 1d6 + Charisma modifier damage, and you slide the target 2 squares.
During the slide, you or one of your allies can make a melee basic attack against the target as a free interrupt, with a +2 power bonus to the attack roll.

section.name: Virtue of Cunning:
section.text: The power bonus equals 2 + one-half your Intelligence modifier.

section.name: Miss:
section.text: You slide the target 1 square.

power.title: Disorienting Ditty
power.fluff: You shake your enemy's senses with a shocking verse, vausing the foe to move erratically

section.name: Target:
section.text: One creature

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Charisma vs. Will

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 1d8 + Charisma modifier psychic damage.

section.name: Effect:
section.text: Choose a square adjacent to the target.
If the target does not enter that square before the end of its next turn, it takes psychic damage equal to your Charisma modifier + your implement's enhancement bonus.

power.title: Fast Friends
power.fluff: You sing a tune of false friendship, leaving your foe in a reverie

section.name: Target:
section.text: One creature

section.name: Effect:
section.text: Choose yourself or an ally.
The target considers the chosen character to be its friend until the end of your next turn or until you or one of your allies attacks the target, whichever comes first.

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Charisma vs. Will

section.name: Hit:
section.text: The target cannot attack the character it considers a friend.

section.name: Miss:
section.text: The target takes a penalty to attack rolls against the chosen character and cannot make opportunity attack against him or her while it considers the character to be a friend. The penalty equals your Charisma modifier.

power.title: Firemetal Shot
power.fluff: You bury a bold deep in your opponent's flesh

section.name: Target:
section.text: One creature

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Charisma vs. AC

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 1[W] + Charisma modifier damage.

section.name: Effect:
section.text: Until the end of your next turn, whenever an ally hits the target, the attack deals extra fire damage equal to your Intelligence modifier, or one-half your Intelligence modifier if your attack was a miss.

power.title: Focused Sound
power.fluff: With a resounding shout, you rattle your enemy and expose a vulnerable spot in its defenses

section.name: Target:
section.text: One creature

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Charisma vs. Fortitude

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 1d10 + Charisma modifier thunder damage.
Until the end of your next turn, any attack against the target can score a critical hit on a roll of 18 to 20.

section.name: Miss:
section.text: Charisma modifier + your implement's enhancement bonus thunder damage, and the first attack against the target before the end of your next turn can score a critical hit on a roll of 18 to 20.

power.title: Inspiring Refrain
power.fluff: Your weapon hums with an arcane song that helps guide nearby allies to glory

section.name: Target:
section.text: One creature

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Charisma vs. AC

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 2[W] + Charisma modifier damage.

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You activate an Aura 5 (Arcane) until the end of your next turn. Allies in the aura have a +1 power bonus to attack rolls.

power.title: Lesser Dimensional Step
power.fluff: As your weapon strikes, you and one of your allies vanish from one spot and appear in another, confusing your opponent

section.name: Trigger:
section.text: You hit an enemy within 5 squares of you with either a basic attack or Bard at-will attack with the Weapon keyword

section.name: Target:
section.text: You and one ally in the burst

section.name: Effect:
section.text: The triggering attack deals +1[W] additional damage to the triggering enemy.
After the triggering attack has been resolved, each target teleports to a space adjacent to the target.

power.title: Lesser Flash of Distraction
power.fluff: A sudden burst of light and a blast of noise leaves your foe momentarily disoriented

section.name: Trigger:
section.text: You hit an enemy within 5 squares of you with either a basic attack or Bard at-will attack with the Weapon keyword

section.name: Effect:
section.text: The triggering enemy is dazed by the triggering attack until the end of your next turn.

power.title: Lesser Ringing Weapon
power.fluff: You drive your weapon into an enemy and then channel a spell through it, causing it to ring like a tuning fork and draw the attention of others

section.name: Trigger:
section.text: You hit an enemy within 5 squares of you with either a basic attack or Bard at-will attack with the Weapon keyword

section.name: Effect:
section.text: The triggering attack deals an extra +1d10 thunder damage to the triggering enemy and the triggering enemy is ringing until the end of your next turn.
While ringing, the enemy grants combat advantage and cannot benefit from any concealment.

power.title: Prophesied Strike
power.fluff: You cast your mind's eye forward a split second, predicting the best moment for a telling blow

section.name: Target:
section.text: One creature

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Charisma vs. AC
Roll twice and use either result

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 1[W] + Charisma modifier damage.

section.name: Effect:
section.text: The next time you or an ally makes an attack roll against the target, the attacker can roll twice and use either result.

power.title: Prophetic Action
power.fluff: You study your enemy and deduce its next move, letting an ally dodge its attack

section.name: Target:
section.text: One creature

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Charisma vs. Will

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 2d8 + Charisma modifier psychic damage.

section.name: Effect:
section.text: The first time before the end of your next turn that the target misses you or an ally with an attack, choose one target of that attack.
The chosen creature can use an opportunity reaction to shift a number of squares equal to your Wisdom modifier.

power.title: Shout of Triumph
power.fluff: You unleash a mighty call of battle, scattering your enemies while urging your allies forward

section.name: Target:
section.text: Each enemy in the burst

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Charisma vs. Fortitude

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 1d6 + Charisma modifier thunder damage, and you push the target 1 square.

section.name: Virtue of Valor:
section.text: Push up to a number of squares equal to your Constitution modifier.

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You can slide each ally in the blast 1 square or push 2 squares.

section.name: Virtue of Valor:
section.text: Each the maximum distance of the slide or push by your Constitution modifier.

power.title: Thunder's Calling
power.fluff: You chant a verse of storm and thunder, sending your foe tumbling and leaving it open for a deadly shot

section.name: Target:
section.text: One creature

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Charisma vs. Fortitude

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 1d8 + Charisma modifier thunder damage, and you slide the target a number of squares equal to your Wisdom modifier.

section.name: Effect:
section.text: If the target is not adjacent to any creature, choose one ally within 10 squares of you. The chosen ally can make a ]]ranged basic attack against the target as a free reaction.
